Name: Cosmetic palette
Description: This cosmetic palette  represents an animal. The horns, which are lyre shaped, allow its identification as being an antelope. The head and the legs are rather small in relation to the body; the object served to grind pigments and to mix the powder thus collected with fat in order  to obtain cosmetics. The eye is emphasized by an incrustation of shellfish. Note the hole for suspension at the top of the palette.
